mapper.update:
update hy_order_task
case_no = #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transport_type = #{transportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
support_linkman = #{supportLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
support_linktel = #{supportLinktel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_linkman = #{caseLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_linktel = #{caseLinktel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_linkman = #{sendLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_linktel = #{sendLinktel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_linkman = #{receiveLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_linktel = #{receiveLinktel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carry_linktel = #{carryLinktel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carry_linkman = #{carryLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insurer_linkman = #{insurerLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insurer_linktel = #{insurerLinktel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insured_linkman = #{insuredLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insured_linktel = #{insuredLinktel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

buyer_user_name = #{buyerUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_entrust = #{isEntrust,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carry_time = #{carryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cargo_name = #{cargoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accident_time = #{accidentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
accident_address = #{accidentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accident_company = #{accidentCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loss_desc = #{lossDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
survey_require = #{surveyRequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accident_cause = #{accidentCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
limit_time = #{limitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_money = #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
real_money = #{realMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
express_address = #{expressAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_detail_address = #{expressDetailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_prov_code = #{expressProvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_city_code = #{expressCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_area_code = #{expressAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_linkman = #{expressLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
express_linktel = #{expressLinktel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accident_detail_opinion = #{accidentDetailOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.case_no, t.order_no, t.transport_type, t.support_linkman, t.support_linktel, t.case_linkman, t.case_linktel, t.send_linkman, t.send_linktel, t.receive_linkman, t.receive_linktel, t.carry_linktel, t.carry_linkman, t.insurer_linkman, t.insurer_linktel, t.insured_linkman, t.insured_linktel, t.buyer_user_id, t.buyer_user_name, t.is_entrust, t.carry_time, t.cargo_name, t.accident_time, t.accident_address, t.accident_company, t.loss_desc, t.survey_require, t.accident_cause, t.limit_time, t.pay_money, t.real_money, t.express_address, t.express_linkman, t.express_linktel, t.accident_detail_opinion, t.remark FROM hy_order_task t WHERE t.case_no = #{caseNo}

select t.id, t.case_no, t.order_no, t.transport_type, t.support_linkman, t.support_linktel, t.case_linkman, t.case_linktel, t.send_linkman, t.send_linktel, t.receive_linkman, t.receive_linktel, t.carry_linktel, t.carry_linkman, t.insurer_linkman, t.insurer_linktel, t.insured_linkman, t.insured_linktel, t.buyer_user_id, t.buyer_user_name, t.is_entrust, t.carry_time, t.cargo_name, t.accident_time, t.accident_address, t.accident_company, t.loss_desc, t.survey_require, t.accident_cause, t.limit_time, t.pay_money, t.real_money, t.express_address, t.express_detail_address, t.express_prov_code, t.express_city_code, t.express_area_code, t.express_linkman, t.express_linktel, t.accident_detail_opinion, t.remark, h.id AS h_id, h.task_id AS h_task_id, h.start_address, h.end_address FROM hy_order_task t LEFT JOIN hy_order_task_haulway h ON t.id = h.task_id WHERE t.order_no = #{orderNo}

select t.id, t.case_no, t.order_no, t.transport_type, t.support_linkman, t.support_linktel, t.case_linkman, t.case_linktel, t.send_linkman, t.send_linktel, t.receive_linkman, t.receive_linktel, t.carry_linktel, t.carry_linkman, t.insurer_linkman, t.insurer_linktel, t.insured_linkman, t.insured_linktel, t.buyer_user_id, t.buyer_user_name, t.is_entrust, t.carry_time, t.cargo_name, t.accident_time, t.accident_address, t.accident_company, t.loss_desc, t.survey_require, t.accident_cause, t.limit_time, t.pay_money, t.real_money, t.express_address, t.express_detail_address, t.express_prov_code, t.express_city_code, t.express_area_code, t.express_linkman, t.express_linktel, t.accident_detail_opinion, t.remark, h.id AS h_id, h.task_id AS h_task_id, h.start_address, h.end_address FROM hy_order_task t LEFT JOIN hy_order_task_haulway h ON t.id = h.task_id WHERE t.case_no = #{caseNo}
